item.title: Day 2 #100DaysOfCode
item.description: Day 2 Key Learnings: pages folder name is reserved in nextjs. Others like components is not reserved. How props are passed to a component. Utilize _app.js for anything that affects all pages like Layout - wrap with Layout component, Navigation (with links) Using Programmatic (Imperative) Navigation The usual rule of a Reach Hook: Only use directly only at the root level of component function. (e.
